Communication.Proxy

Interface ServerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BenchInterface, PlaygroundInterface, RepositoryInterface, SiteInterface

    public interface ServerInterface
    This file defines the server interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message processAndReply(Message inMessage, ServerComm scon)
      Processes the received messages and replies to the entity that sent it.
      boolean serviceEnded()
      Tell the service if it is allowed to end or not.

      • processAndReply

        Message processAndReply(Message inMessage,
                        ServerComm scon)
                 throws MessageException,
                        java.net.SocketException
        Processes the received messages and replies to the entity that sent it.
        Parameters:
        inMessage - The received message.
        scon - Server communication.
        Returns:
        Returns the reply to the received message.
        Throws:
        MessageException
        java.net.SocketException

      • serviceEnded

        boolean serviceEnded()
        Tell the service if it is allowed to end or not.
        Returns:
        True if the system can terminate, false otherwise.
